text: Chɨbol nɨbop ak ma asɨkek, tap si tap tɨmel gɨpɨm ak taynen anɨgɨpun agɨl, kelɨgɨnɨgun agɨl gos ak ma nepɨm. Nɨbi tap tɨmel yɨbɨl okok gɨ mɨdɨl, gach nɨbi ak gem awl gɨl pel ak pel ak amub. Pen God binɨb okok kɨlop yɨpɨd gɨl tɨg asɨk bɨlokɨnɨgab ñɨn ak, nɨbop gos tɨmel nɨŋɨd yul awl ñek, nɨbi yɨpɨl awl dɨnɨgabɨm.
